root.name: Debts
root.description: Your family wound up with massive debts, and you found yourself coming to work at the mansion as repayment.

root.name: Slave
root.description: You are a slave, and have no choice about your line of work.

root.name: Mistress
root.description: Although you appear to be a maid, it would be more accurate to call you the master’s lover.

root.name: Revenge
root.description: The master is your hated enemy, and you are infiltrating his mansion in order to extract revenge.

root.name: Orphan
root.description: You are an orphan adopted by the master or his parents.

root.name: Illegitimate Child
root.description: You are an illegitimate child. From a legal standpoint you’re no different from the master.

root.name: Hereditary Maid
root.description: You were born into a family that has served the mansion for generations.

root.name: Self Punishment
root.description: In order to punish yourself for your inexperience or sins, you have taken up the job of a maid.

root.name: Unrequited Love
root.description: Following your one-sided love of the master, you have come here.

root.name: Business
root.description: You are a maid because you want the wages. And that’s about it.

root.name: Infiltrator
root.description: You are a member of an organization that opposes the master, and you have been sent to spy on or possibly even assassinate him.

root.name: Loyalty
root.description: You feel great loyalty to the master.

root.name: Childhood Friend
root.description: As the master’s childhood friend, you’ve used your influence to get here.

root.name: Admirer of Maids
root.description: You have long admired maids, and through much hard work you’ve finally become one yourself.

root.name: Returning a Favor
root.description: The master did a great service to you, and you have become a maid in order to repay him.

root.name: Distant Relative
root.description: Although you are only distantly related to the master, your parents have put you in his care.

root.name: Bridal Training
root.description: You became a maid in order to prepare yourself to become an ideal bride some day.

root.name: Who Knows?
root.description: You’re really not quite sure how you wound up becoming a maid.
